infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RendetaljeOS needs location access to track job locations and optimize routes for cleaning services.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: RendetaljeOS needs location access to track job locations and optimize routes for cleaning services.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: RendetaljeOS needs camera access to take before/after photos of cleaning jobs for quality documentation.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: RendetaljeOS needs photo library access to save and manage job documentation photos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: RendetaljeOS needs microphone access for voice commands with AI Friday assistant.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow RendetaljeOS to use your location to track job locations and optimize routes.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow RendetaljeOS to access your camera to take photos for job documentation.
